desc: Formerly ErgoEdge/AmpDesk | The customisable height adjustable desk kills clutter and keeps you healthier while you work. Ergonomic desk, monitor arm Singapore.

layout.text: Save up to $485 on your very own EverDesk+!

Over 70 size and design configurations to fit your
body, style and workspace.

Engineered durability, with an industry-leading 10
-year warranty.

Fast and free shipping – get your desk within
3-7 days.
